item.title: About Agustín
item.description: Who am I? Hello my name is Agustín, I’m a senior software developer with reverse engineering skills and graphics designer. Skills Sofware development (C++, Golang, C#, Java and many other languages) Reverse engineering (IDA Pro, Ghidra, x64dbg) Graphics designer (Photoshop, Illustrator, Blender, After-Effects)
